function array_flatten($array) { 
        if (!is_array($array)) { 
            return FALSE; 
        }
 
        $result = array(); 
        foreach ($array as $key => $value) { 
            if (is_array($value)) { 
                $result = array_merge($result, array_flatten($value)); 
            } else { 
                $result[$key] = $value; 
            } 
        } 
      
        return $result; 
    }
